# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
\.avi$
\.bin$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\..
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.patch$
\.png$
\.qca
\.squashfs$
\.svg$
\.wav$
^\.github/
^\Qinclude/netfilter.mk\E$
^\Qinclude/uclibc++.mk\E$
^\Qscripts/spelling.txt\E$
^config/
^include/site/
^package/
^scripts/config/
^scripts/config\.
^scripts/flashing/
^target/linux/
^toolchain/
^tools/
ignore$
